The user completes the submission of the form
Hi there! I'm here to help. What can I assist you with today?

You can provide feedback by clicking the button below titled 'Fill this form'. It will redirect you to our feedback form. We appreciate your input!

Message: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Sure, I can help with that! Could you please let me know which platform you're trying to integrate the NewsBreak Pixel with? For example, Shopify, ShopLazza, or another platform?

It looks like you're interested in setting up a NewsBreak Pixel with Google Tag Manager (GTM). To do this, you'll need to install the NewsBreak Pixel base code on GTM. Here's a quick overview of the steps:

1. Log in to your Google Tag Manager account and select the appropriate Workspace for your website.
2. Click on 'Tags' in the left-hand sidebar and then click the 'New' button.
3. Give this tag a meaningful name (e.g., NewsBreak Pixel Base Code), then click on the 'Tag Configuration' box.
4. Choose 'Custom HTML' and input your scripts.
5. In a separate tab, log in to NewsBreak Ad Manager, go to Tools -> Event Tracking, create an event with Pixel, and choose to integrate with GTM.
6. Copy the NewsBreak Pixel conversion code from your NewsBreak Ad Manager Event Tracking Tool and paste it into GTM.
7. Create or select an existing trigger for your conversion pixel.
8. Save your changes and test if the pixel is installed correctly using GTM's Preview mode or the NewsBreak Ad Manager Event Tracking Tool.

For detailed instructions, you can refer to our help article here: [How to install a NewsBreak Pixel with GTM](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/14333966189581-How-to-install-a-NewsBreak-Pixel-with-GTM).

To test if your NewsBreak Pixel is installed correctly on your website using Google Tag Manager (GTM), follow these steps:

1. Go to the Workspace for your website and click the 'Preview' button on the top right.
2. You should see a popup that says “Connected!”.
3. Input your landing page URL and click the 'Connect' button. A new tab with your webpage will appear.
4. Trigger your conversion event in the new webpage.
5. On GTM, you should see both the base code tag and the conversion tag you created shown in the Tags tab, under Tags Fired.

Alternatively, you can test using the NewsBreak Ad Manager Event Tracking Tool:

1. Log into NewsBreak Ad Manager.
2. Go to Tools -> Event Tracking and find section 3 - Test pixel integration.
3. Input your landing page URL, then click 'Go test' button and a new tab should appear.
4. Trigger your conversion event in the webpage opened by the NewsBreak Event Tracking Tool.
5. You should see a successful test result with both your base code and conversion code installed correctly.

For more detailed instructions, check out our help article: [How to install a NewsBreak Pixel with GTM](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/14333966189581-How-to-install-a-NewsBreak-Pixel-with-GTM).
